changeSet.author: iago
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE curso ( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, titulo VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, autor VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, categoria VARCHAR(255), publish_date DATE, CONSTRAINT pk_id PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.author: sha
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE transaction ( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, curso BIGINT NOT NULL, user_id BIGINT NOT NULL, date_of_issue DATETIME, CONSTRAINT pk_id PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT fk_tran_course FOREIGN KEY (curso_id) REFERENCES curse(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );
